About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

There's not much to know about me I'm just your average person.

I have been a professional gamer for the past 7 years. I have a 12 year old german shorthaired pointer who is the best dog ever. I canoe as much as possible and I live in the gym.

Being part of the tech industry has been a huge passion of mine since highschool and I can't wait to see where it takes me!
